Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This offering holds immense value, worth $12000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
